ee nithipathi departhamenthuwa adhikaranaya hamuwe dakwu karunu salakillata ganimin.mema naduwe palamu sakakaruweku lesa nam kara athi parpechuwal te්rasharis samagamata labana 18 wanada adhikaranaya hamuwe peni sitina lesa sithasi nikuth kirimata da kolambaa kotuwa mahesthrath ranga disanayaka niyoga kala.emenma, naduwe 10 wana sakakaru lesa nam kara thibu shri lanka mahabankuwe rajya naya departhamenthuwe adhikari buddhika sarath chandrata erehiwa naduwa pawathwagena yamata pramanawath sakshi nomathi wima hethuwen ohuta warenthu ho sithasi nikuth kirimak siduwuye naha.kese wethath, hitapu parlimenthu manthri rawi karunanayaka athulu 10 denata warenthu nikuth kirimedi nithipathiwaraya wisin gonukala paminille karunu walata anuwa nadukarayak pawathwagena yamata tharam, sakshi pawathina bawata adhikaranaya thindu kala.
mesiya hewath galawumkaruwa lesin pawasa pamini nasarath hi jesusta aya siya samiya sama karana atharama awasanaye aya rayifalayakin wedi thaba ohu maradamayi.
balen nawakayanwa palanaya karanna giyama prashna udgatha wenawa.

mema prathipaththi walata anuwa wada usas jiwana thathwayak saha sahimakata pathwiya haki saukhyaya thathwayak sandaha mathru saukhyaya, lama saukhyaya, pawul salasuma saha anikuth kantha gatalu sandaha wadi awadhanayak yomu wi atha.

unwahansege bhikshu jiwithaya dinen dina aalokaya kara gaman karuna manpeth wiwara karamin 1980 warshaya elambaimath samanga mahanuwara pradeshiya sangha sabhawe sabhapathi dhuraya da 1986 di shri lanka ramanynya maha nikaye ema sangha sabhawe lekhakadhikari padawiyada 1987 di ema nikaye sanynya lekhakadhikari dhurayada 1998 di adhikarana sanghanayaka padawiyada 2008 di miyanmar rajyayen aggamaha panditha gaurawopadhiyenda pidum labuha.swakiya sangha sabhawe nomada gaurawa sammanayata pathra wu na himiyo sambuddha shasanaye chirasthiya udesa sidukala anupameya sewaya angayumata lakkara pasugiya da apawath wi wadala athipujya wewaldeniye medhalankara mahanayaka mahimiyangen purappadu wu mahanayaka padawiya eekach chandayen napana pemasiri na himiyanta bara ganimata sidu wuha.wishala shishya bhikshu parapurak dayada kala maha na himiyo siw desin wadamakeruna maha sangaruwana ge aashirwada madhyaye sambudu shasanaye unnathiya udesa dunuwila sandagiri len wiharaya, kundasala warapitiya bodhirukkharamaya, pallekale silawansha bauddha madhyasthanaya, hamindagoda siri sumanaramaya, rajawalle shri purwaramaya ha aluth waththa mihindu dharma pitaya yana wiharasthana rashiyak na himiyange margopadeshakathwaya athiwa idikala seka.ema wiharasthanayanhi dharma patashalawan aarambha kara pradeshaye daru dariyan ge dharmabodhaya wada wardhanaya kirima was siduwana sewaya athi uthum ya.unwahanse nirahankara gathi gunawalin suposhithaya.
eda thibunu eksath jathika pakshaya neweyi ada thiyenne.

2013 nowambar 09 senasurada laksha 15ka konthraththuwak di aniyam samiya elowa yawu kotipathiniya athadanguwata mudal illa digin digatama karadara kirima nisa dadi lesa kopayata pathwa athi mema kotipathi kanthawa siya aniyam samiya ghathanaya kirimata mema konthraththuwa kaduwela prade shaye sanwidhanathmaka kanda yamak wetha bharadi athi bawada anawaranaya wiya. e.ja.pa. ya 'chogam' samarambhaka sasiyata pamanayi samuluwen anathuruwa pawathwena kisidu sasiyakata e.ja.pa. ya sahabhagi nowana athara samuluwa pilibandawa wipaksha nayaka ranil wikramasinha mahatha kisidu adahas dakwimakata ho nila prakashanayak sidu kirima nokarana...

wyawastha sampadanaya mahajanaya ruju lesa thorapath kara ganna wyawastha sampadaka mandalayakin se ma ee sandaha thora pathkara ganna komishan sabhawakin aarambha kota komishan sabhawa sakas karana ketumpatha wyawastha sampadana mandalaya magin awasana washayen paripurna kerena aakarayatada sidukala hakiya.sampadanaya kerena mul ketumpatha dewani ketumpatha ha awasana ketumpathatada mahajanathawage danaganima sandaha pa්rasiddhiyata path kala yuthuya.

batugoda shri jayasundararama maha wiharadhipathi, dharmawedi nalande wimalawansha himiminis ho thirisan ho kumana aathmayaka upannath maniyakage kusayen bihiwima swabhawika upathak washayen salakiya hakiya.

ee nisa mama paya bhagayak pamana pama wuna’ kiyamin aya pirisa atharata giye pudumakara lengathukamin.‘mulinma mata oyagollo handunwa dennako’mulinma umayangana kathawata mula piruwe elesini.kathawa arambauwe soma pathirana.‘soma aawe kahawaththe indala’ yayi aya anek ayawath handunwa dunne pirisata nayakathwaya laba dennak meni.udasana hathe sita sarasawiyata pamina siti ginigathhene anula, umayangana desa nethu nosolwa bala sitiyi.‘mage hinayak saba wuna’‘akke oyage palamu teli natya mokakda?’ee nimaliyi.sudath rohana mahathmayage ‘katu imbaula’ teli natyaye koyin manikage charithaya.ethakota oya janapriya wune dedunu nisa neda?

kulangana samithi, dahampasal manmawath pasal jala wyapruthi, rohal, aadiya gammanayanhi aarambha kirimata peramuna gena katayuthu karathi.mihinthale katupotha gampiyase bodhirajaramaya anuradhapura , iluppukulama gampiyase shri sudarshanaramaya yana wiharasthana aarambha kara uktha sewawan ema sthanawalatada laba dunha.galewela weththiyaya shri jayabodhi wiharasthanayath,anuradhapura pandukabhayapura rajamaha wiharayath, dodamgaslanda udakandawala purana wiharayath, prathisanskaranaya karamin mahajanathawage siyalu aagamika katayuthu itukaraganimata pramanawath wiharasthana bawata pathkaleya.periyankadunalawa pothgul wiharayada udakandawala rathmalgoda abhinawaramayada sanwardhanaya karamin ema gammanawalata imahath sewayak itu karathi.panas wani wiya sampurna karana unwahanseta digasiri pathamu!.chandrathilaka rathnayakaibbagamuwa wisheshamathale udupihille halangoda shri rajamaha kohon wiharadhipathin wahanse pilibanda guna samaruma mema juni 8,9 dedina thula sidu kerini.mahanuwara udadumbara wendaruwa nam game herath eekanayaka mudiyanselage ukkubanda ha udurawana disanayaka mudiyanselage bandara manikege puthanu keneku lesa ranbanda namin upatha ladde 1920 marthu 22 wana dinaya.1930 di mathale oowilikandaraja maha wiharasthanaye wada siti deshiya waidyawarayaku wu kaluwalgoda shri sobhitha wiharadhipathi himi langa pawidi bawa laba atha.
pradarshana bhanda iwath kara ganima wunath minisunta hithanna yamak ithiri karala thiyenawa.
